snippet.title: How Did You Hear About This Position? Career Interview Tips - How To Answer This
snippet.description:
How Did You Hear About Our Company? Job Interview Help - Career Interview Question - Ep10
There are a few reasons that they could be asking this question:

1. they may want to know how their advertising is doing.
2. they want to know what attracted you to apply.
3. Or they are just curious to know.

Here you'll learn: - 
How to answer this question - How to structure your response - Helpful tips to use for yourself 

1️⃣ Hit subscribe and be the first to see new videos ✔ 2️⃣ Share this with someone who needs to see this ✔ 3️⃣ Leave a comment and a like ✔
